articles.title: Hello World
articles.contents:
Hi! My name is Harry Fisher, thanks for visiting my site. I currently work as a research data scientist at Pharmatelligence based in Cardiff, Wales. I enjoy using R and recently became a RStudio certified instructor. Previously, I completed my PhD at Cardiff Metropolitan University in December 2019, investigating risk factors associated with sports injury. I enjoy writing about things I‚Äôm working on and try to share some interesting things I discover on my blog.
Feel free to get in touch if any of the posts catch your interest!
R packages
bitmexr: R Client for the BitMEX Exchange 
poweRof10: Tools to scrape data from www.thepowerof10.info 
Research
Fisher et al.¬†2020. An interdisciplinary examination of stress and injury in athletes. [Link]

Blog
My personal website / blog. Based on the distill theme by Rstudio.
